H0.text: what states do not allow daylight savings time. Arizona

H1.text: what states do not allow daylight savings time. Alaska

H2.text: what states do not allow daylight savings time. Florida

H3.text: what states do not allow daylight savings time. Hawaii

A4.text: Arizona is one of two U.S. states, along with Hawaii, that does not observe Daylight Saving Time, though the large Navajo Nation in the state's northeastern region does.
